DataElement.preferredDefinition: Descriptive name of the inclusion or exclusion criterion that was the exception as defined by the sponsor.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Inclusion Exclusion Criterion Test Clinical Study Sponsor Defined Name
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A character or string that represents the full name of the inclusion exclusion criterion assessment._An entity such as an individual, company, institution, group, or organization which takes responsibility for the initiation, management, and/or financing of a clinical study. The sponsor does not actually conduct the investigation unless the sponsor is a sponsor-investigator. A person other than an individual (e.g., corporation or agency) that uses one or more of its own employees to conduct research it has initiated is considered to be a sponsor, and the employees are considered to be investigators. [21 CFR P.50.3(k)] [21 CFR P.50.102(j)] [21 CFR P.312.3]_Clearly characterized or delimited._The words or language units by which a thing is known.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: A character or string that represents the full name of the inclusion exclusion criterion assessment.

An entity such as an individual, company, institution, group, or organization which takes responsibility for the initiation, management, and/or financing of a clinical study. The sponsor does not actually conduct the investigation unless the sponsor is a sponsor-investigator. A person other than an individual (e.g., corporation or agency) that uses one or more of its own employees to conduct research it has initiated is considered to be a sponsor, and the employees are considered to be investigators. [21 CFR P.50.3(k)] [21 CFR P.50.102(j)] [21 CFR P.312.3]
The words or language units by which a thing is known.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2/27/20 Created to support sponsor defined codelists; tmt. 9.25.20 Changed context by CTEP CDE Harmonization request. mc

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the description of t
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the description of the inclusion criterion the subject did not meet or the exclusion criterion the subject met?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Sponsor's could automatically populated the text in EDC systems when the Criterion Identifier is populated by the investigator. This can be verified by the PI to ensure the right Exception Identifier was selected.

ReferenceDocuments.name: IETEST
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable. The SDTMIG variable IETESTCD may be determined from the value collected in IETEST. The SDTMIG variables IETESTCD and IETEST are required in the SDTM submission datasets.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the description of the criterion, if not pre-printed on the CRF. If collected on the CRF, the sponsor may provide additional instructions to ensure the data is entered as intended.

DataElement.changeDescription: 3-11-20 Created for sponsor defined codelists; tmt. 9.25.2020 Changed context by CTEP CDE Harmonization request and released. mc
